cbinstall.name: CB Conditional
cbinstall.author: Krileon
cbinstall.copyright: (C) 2004-2016 www.joomlapolis.com / Lightning MultiCom SA - and its licensors, all rights reserved
cbinstall.description: Enables conditional show/hide of fields and show/hide of tabs based off fields value.

param.name: cbconditional_display
param.label: Display
param.description: Select conditional display for this tab.

param.name: cbconditional_field
param.label: Field
param.description: Select field to match value against in determining this tabs display.

param.name: cbconditional_customvalue
param.label: Value
param.description: Input substitution supported value to match against. In addition to user substitutions you can access $_REQUEST, $_GET, and $_POST substitutions as [request_VARIABLE],[post_VARIABLE], and [get_VARIABLE] (e.g. [get_task]).

param.name: cbconditional_customvalue_translate
param.label: Translate Value
param.description: Enable or disable translation of language strings in value.

param.name: cbconditional_customviewaccesslevels
param.label: View Access Levels
param.description: Select the view access levels to match against the user. The user only needs to have one of the selected view access levels to match.

param.name: cbconditional_customusergroups
param.label: Usergroups
param.description: Select the usergroups to match against the user. The user only needs to have one of the selected usergroups to match.

param.name: cbconditional_operator
param.label: Operator
param.description: Select operator to compare field value against input value.

param.name: cbconditional_value
param.label: Value
param.description: Input substitution supported value to match against field value. In addition to user substitutions you can access $_REQUEST, $_GET, and $_POST substitutions as [request_VARIABLE],[post_VARIABLE], and [get_VARIABLE] (e.g. [get_task]).

param.name: cbconditional_value_translate
param.label: Translate Value
param.description: Enable or disable translation of language strings in value.

param.name: cbconditional_mode
param.label: Mode
param.description: Select how to handle this tabs display based on field value match.

param.name: cbconditional_target_reg
param.label: Registration
param.description: Enable or disable conditional usage on registration.

param.name: cbconditional_target_edit
param.label: Profile Edit
param.description: Enable or disable conditional usage on profile edit.

param.name: cbconditional_target_view
param.label: Profile View
param.description: Enable or disable conditional usage on profile view.

param.name: cond_backend
param.label: Backend
param.description: Enable or disable usage of conditions in Backend.

param.name: cond_reset
param.label: Reset
param.description: Enable or disable reset of field values to blank if condition is not met.

param.name: cond_debug
param.label: Debug
param.description: Enable or disable condition debugging. Debugging will log jQuery condition results to the browser console while PHP side debugging will output directly their results.
